hydrostreamer 0.2.1

Reference

All functions

accumulate_flow()

Apply river routing based on selected routing method.

accumulate_flow_instant()

Compute instantaneous flow for each timestep

average_monthly_runoff()

Monthly average of a runoff timeseries. Expects the timeseries to start from January and end in December.

basin

Area of Interest polygon

compute_area_weights()

Compute weights for river catchment areas within the runoff area features.

compute_river_weights()

Compute weights for river segments within runoff area features.

compute_segment_runoff()

Computes specific runoff generated in the river segment.

compute_segment_runoff_without_HSweights()

Computes specific runoff generated in the river segment without using a HSweights object.

compute_weights()

Computes weights to assign runoff from runoff area features to the supplied river network.

delineate_basin()

Delineate catchments from multiple input points

flow_network()

Generates neighbour information from a connected, directed river network.

hydrostreamer

hydrostreamer: A package for assigning runoff outputs from hydrological or land surface models to explicit river segments.

polygrid_timeseries()

Polygonizes a raster and adds cell values as attribute columns to an 'sf' polygon object.

river

Example river network

river_hierarchy()

Computes river hierarchies from a connected river network.

river_outlets()

Identify locations from where to start catchment delineation.

river_voronoi()

Create segment-specific Voronoi diagram from a network.

split_river_with_grid()

Split river segments at runoff unit (polygon) boundaries.

switch_grid()

Switch the runoff grid in HSweights object

upstream()

Find all upstream segments from a point

Contents

  • All functions
